./data/product_textfiles/Acrux_AR_Mounta.__data__:
{"id_":"./data/product_textfiles/Acrux_AR_Mountaineering_Boot.txt","metadata":{},"excludedEmbedMetadataKeys":[],"excludedLlmMetadataKeys":[],"relationships":{},"hash":"eGX/dPlaUY7g6OXWQzswGk6AkCyUVZUWV7jPREYj03Q=","text":"Product URL: acrux-ar-mountaineering-boot

ID: X000006368

Name: Acrux AR Mountaineering Boot

Description:
The task was to create the lightest, most durable, best fitting, lowest volume weatherproof double boot ever made. The Acrux AR is the result. Designed for mountaineering, ice and mixed climbing, the Acrux AR combines the light weight and low volume of a single boot with the insulation, protection and quick drying advantages of a double boot. The comfort and support of Arcteryx Adaptive Fit technology, unique laminated construction, and a wide range of innovative components and materials are all leveraged to meet the dynamic needs of the alpine climbers foot and the rigorous demands of extreme environments. Years in the making, the Acrux AR is an unprecedented achievement that meets the full spectrum of performance demands.THE NEEDClimbers and professional mountain guides require use-specific performance across a range of alpine conditions and terrain. Their boot needs to provide support and security on mixed routes, ice climbs and glacial traverses. It needs to keep the foot warm, dry and comfortable, then dry quickly if moisture accumulates. It needs to withstand repeated use on rugged terrain. It needs to fit and provide a supportive platform. It needs to deliver all of this in a lightweight, low volume package for agility and freedom in extreme situations. Until now, some of these needs would have to be sacrificed to meet the others.CREATING THE SOLUTIONArcteryx took the time to develop and meld new technologies so that the Acrux AR could satisfy the range of climbers needs without compromise. Arcteryx Adaptive Fit technology uses a removable bootie that employs stretch textiles and minimal seams to create an instant custom fit with no pressure. With protection extended beyond the cuff of the boot and the highest level of breathability in this category, the booties GORE-TEX membrane optimizes climate control and waterproof benefit. The perforated PE foams quick dry properties improve comfort, and a rubberized sole allows the bootie to be used as a camp shoe. The PE inner shell is preformed to compliment the booties Adaptive Fit performance while providing insulation and a secure foothold.  Laminated Watertight construction and an exceptionally breathable GORE-TEX gaiter deliver total protection from water with a high level of abrasion and puncture resistance to offset potential damage from crampons and rock. The specially developed Vibram AR outsole is designed for support and sure footedness. The tread and construction feature a semi-blocked toe, with anti-slip grooves, a medial climbing support zone, and heel created to provide braking on steep descents. The Vibram Mont rubber compound maintains its performance in sub-zero conditions.

Short Description:
A pinnacle of design for mountaineering, ice and mixed climbing, the Acrux AR is the lightest, most durable, and lowest profile insulated double boot available. AR: All-Round. Includes 1 pair of GORE-TEX HIGH-LINERS.

Features:
- Waterproof
- Breathable
- Lightweight
- Abrasion resistant

Gender Category:
unisex

- Footwear

Subcategories:
- GORE-TEX (Waterproof)
- Boots

Description:
Utilizing elite trail running technologies to make it agile, fast, and light  and made with an engineered mesh for maximum breathability  the Aerios Aura Mid is a performance shoe for hikes in hot weather. The recycled polyester upper provides airflow and employs a more open weave in zones prone to overheating. The tongue integrates with the lining for a fit that minimizes friction, the taller collar adds support and helps seal out debris, and the Vibram Megagrip outsole provides a confident grip across a range of terrain.

Short Description:
Lightweight, highly breathable, supportive shoe for hot-weather hiking.

Name: Aerios FL 2 Mid GTX Shoe

Description:
Fast and light, comfortable and supportive, the Aerios FL 2 Mid GTX is for extended hikes on technical trails. The design synthesizes with your foot to minimize friction, and the collar adds support and helps seal out debris. The upper is light, durable, and made from 100% recycled polyester, the lacing system wraps the foot for a natural fit and feel, and a GORE-TEX membrane delivers waterproof, breathable protection. Agility, stability, and confidence underfoot come from the Vibram Megagrip outsole, compressed EVA midsole, and integrated TPU shank.

Short Description:
Agile and supportive GORE-TEX shoe for extended hikes on technical trails. I FL: Fast and Light.

ID: X000007620

Name: Aerios Nivalis GTX Shoe

Description:
This is the shoe for fast and light hiking in wet, cold, wintery conditions. The durable upper combines GORE-TEX for waterproof, breathable protection and a water-repellant stretch gaiter to help seal out wet and snow. The run-inspired design is reinforced for added stability and confidence, and a Vibram XS Trek Evo outsole has Arctic Grip zones for traction on wet, icy terrain. The glove-friendly quick-lace system wraps the foot, and raised perimeter sidewalls add lateral support.

The performance comes from the Teslin material, a blend of nylon and stretch fibres. The waistband adjusts for a secure fit, and a zippered side pocket is secure and easy to access. The fit is trim and streamlined, and ergonomic patterning removes restriction so youre free to explore.

ID: X000006454

Name: Alpha Jacket

Description:
Extreme weather, shifting conditions, varied terrain, motion and rest  these are alpine realities. The Alpha is a highly versatile hardshell designed to handle them. GORE-TEX PRO Most Rugged reinforces high-wear areas, while ultralight, highly abrasion-resistant GORE-TEX with Hadron face fabric zones shed grams and improve breathability. The helmet-compatible StormHood delivers protection without impacting vision, a RECCO reflector can aid search and rescue, and pit zippers add ventilation.

Updated with proprietary Hadron LCP fabric zones in low-wear areas for reduced weight, improved breathability. 

Short Description:
Versatile hybrid GORE-TEX jacket performs across a range of alpine conditions. *The Alpha Jacket was previously the Alpha AR Jacket.

ID: X000006010

Name: Alpha Lightweight Parka

Description:
Winter belays bring a different kind of wet and cold. Our lighter, more packable Alpha belay parka delivers serious warmth and breathable weather-resistant protection so you can stay comfortable  and stay focused. RDS-certified 850-fill goose down is complemented with synthetic insulation in moisture-prone areas. Ultralight, ultra-durable GORE-TEX INFINIUM  windproof, weather resistant, and highly breathable  utilizes our Hadron face, a proprietary technology delivering abrasion resistance rivaling fabrics twice its weight. Fully insulated, a helmet-compatible StormHood  adds warmth and protection.
Size and Fit Tips: Regular Fit - Our classic fit is cut comfortably throughout the chest, waist, hip, and thigh. It allows freedom of movement, provides shape, and layers comfortably over our insulation and midlayers.  Be sure to double-check our new sizing charts before checkout.

Short Description:
Packable 450g belay parka with downs warmth and GORE-TEX INFINIUM protection.

ID: X000005340

Name: Alpha Parka

Description:
Winter belays are unforgiving. The Alpha Parka - our warmest down-insulated belay parka - sheds the cold and wind so you can focus on your task. RDS-certified 850-fill goose downs outstanding warmth is complemented with mapped synthetic insulation for added breathability in moisture-prone areas. Exceptionally breathable 2L GORE-TEX INFINIUM with ultralight, ultra-durable Hadron face fabric blocks wind and resists water while adding warmth equivalent to 100g of down. A proprietary fabric we created to redefine the standard for superlight alpine durability, Hadron is engineered with a liquid crystal polymer ripstop grid to deliver abrasion resistance rivaling fabrics twice its weight. A StormHood protects without impacting lines-of-sight, and the articulated gender-specific design fits comfortably over winter climbing gear.

Belay jacket with GORE-TEX INFINIUM weather protection and durable Hadron face fabric.

Breathable GORE-TEX PRO with Most Rugged Technology is paired with our most durable face fabric  made from 100% recycled materials  for incredibly long-lasting storm protection. {"id_":"./data/product_textfiles/Alpine_Guide_Jacket.txt","metadata":{},"excludedEmbedMetadataKeys":[],"excludedLlmMetadataKeys":[],"relationships":{},"hash":"5r82Yy2oWwkwxAK9+5roboutNx8mMEAwfmrmk4/O4Bw=","text":"Product URL: mens/alpine-guide-jacket-next-gen

ID: X000005298

Name: Alpine Guide Jacket

Description:
The Alpine Guide Jacket is designed with specific features for guides and mountain professionals operating in harsh mountain environments. Striking an ideal balance of weight and durability, the N80d Most Rugged GORE-TEX PRO fabric is proven in severe conditions. Featuring two large chest pockets, the left pocket accommodates a full size radio. ID: X000008017

Name: Arro Waist Pack

Description:
Travel light, travel fast. Made for minimalist day hikes, the Arro holds what you need. The 2.5L capacity is just right for a light windshell, sunscreen, and snacks. The back pocket has the iconic Arro laminated TPU panel for durability and weather protection, and an internal pocket secures keys and smartphone. Carry it how you want  at the waist, over the shoulder, or across the body. And carry comfortably  the padded back and wide mono filament mesh belt allow airflow and provide support.

Short Description:
Versatile hiking pack designed for a comfortable carry and efficient organization.

ID: X000007302

Name: Atom Heavyweight Hoody

Description:
Warm and breathable, wind and weather resistant, packable and durable.  Worn as a cold weather midlayer or standalone during rest phases, the Atom Heavyweight Hoody is one of our most versatile insulation pieces. Its Coreloft synthetic insulation is efficient, effective and resilient. The light, wind resistant and water repellent Tyono 30 shell is treated for extra durability, and Permeair panels under the arms improve ventilation. The insulated helmet compatible hood adds warmth and protection.

Regular Fit - Our classic fit is cut comfortably throughout the chest, waist, hip, and thigh. It allows freedom of movement, provides shape, and layers comfortably over our insulation and midlayers. This model's fit has evolved. Before you check out, please make sure to reference our sizing chart to determine your correct size.

Short Description:
The warmest option in the Atom series performs as a standalone or midlayer. Atom Series: Synthetic insulated midlayers. *The Atom Heavyweight Hoody was previously the Atom AR Hoody.

{"id_":"./data/product_textfiles/Atom_Hoody.txt","metadata":{},"excludedEmbedMetadataKeys":[],"excludedLlmMetadataKeys":[],"relationships":{},"hash":"Oao+z2lJeHu7voX/UL2zicXxJ3rvPXcLRqJJVk9BO/w=","text":"Product URL: womens/atom-hoody

ID: X000006780

Name: Atom Hoody

Description:
Steeped in the alpine, this versatile hoody has warmed climbers, hikers, backcountry skiers and downtown commuters. Worn as a midlayer or standalone, it performs across a range of conditions and output levels. Coreloft Compact insulation retains warmth even if wet and has loft retention that withstands years of packing and unpacking. The water resistant Tyono 20 face fabric is soft, breathable and durable, stretch side panels improve ventilation and freedom, and the insulated StormHood adds warmth.
Size and Fit Tips: The Atoms offer more room in the body than their predecessors, the Atom LTs, for improved comfort, versatility, and freedom of movement.Fitted Fit - This trimmer fit is patterned to stay close to the body through the chest, waist, hip, and thigh. Its low profile eliminates bulk, moves with the body, and fits comfortably over our first layers. This model's fit has evolved. Before you check out, please make sure to reference our sizing chart to determine your correct size.

Short Description:
Light, versatile synthetically insulated hoody works as a midlayer and standalone. Atom Series: Synthetic insulated midlayers. 

Features:

- Breathable
- Lightweight
- Compressible and packable

Comfort is performance. It frees you to explore, try new things, discover new terrain. The Atrel  super light, soft, air permeable, and warm  performs across a range of activities and environments. The lightweight 40gsm recycled Coreloft Compact synthetic fill insulates  even if wet  while allowing airflow. Light, breathable, and durable, the bio-derived 20D ripstop outer stretches for freedom, and the relaxed fit and articulated patterning further remove restriction. A low-profile hood extends coverage.
Size and Fit Tips: The Atrel Full Zip Hoody has a boxy fit, cropped silhouette, and has shorter sleeves than our other insulation pieces.Relaxed Fit - This fit is cut loosely through the chest, waist, hip, and thigh. Relaxed without sacrificing structure and clean lines, it offers comfort and freedom of movement with a more casual look. Be sure to reference our new sizing charts before you check out. 

Short Description:
Lightweight, soft, highly versatile air-permeable Coreloft insulated hoody.

ID: X000006605

Name: Beta AR Jacket

Description:
Packable, breathable, durable waterproof protection across the spectrum of alpine environments and activities, the Beta AR Jacket is created to deliver performance versatility. The GORE-TEX PRO with Most Rugged Technology - a next-gen material we developed in collaboration with Gore - delivers maximum durability. The helmet compatible DropHood has an internal collar for added protection and an embedded RECCO reflector improves searchability in emergency situations. 
Size and Fit Tips: The revised Beta AR Jacket has more room in the chest and waist to accommodate a range of midlayer types  including our Cerium and Atom insulated jackets and hoodies.Regular Fit - Our classic fit is cut comfortably throughout the chest, waist, hip, and thigh. It allows freedom of movement, provides shape, and layers comfortably over our insulation and midlayers. This model's fit has evolved. Before you check out, please make sure to reference our sizing chart to determine your correct size.

ID: X000006958

Name: Bora 60 Backpack

Description:
Backpacking for the weekend - or longer - the Bora 60s carry comfort and durability help you step deep into the wild and reconnect with whats real. Its RotoGlide hipbelt moves with you for better balance and stride, locks out for added stability. The GridLock harness adjusts for a precise fit, and the thermoformed Tegris frame sheet and aluminum stays add support. High-tenacity Cordura pack cloth is backcountry durable, and the lids Weather Vault provides waterproof storage. The main compartment is easy to access, and external pockets keep necessities at hand and wet gear outside.

{"id_":"./data/product_textfiles/Cerium_Hoody.txt","metadata":{},"excludedEmbedMetadataKeys":[],"excludedLlmMetadataKeys":[],"relationships":{},"hash":"kKR7Q/J3c7WIp2hFhoLu7mqjSy6RIwOxLv8yhOO9gdE=","text":"Product URL: womens/cerium-hoody

ID: X000007162

Name: Cerium Hoody

Description:
The Cerium is a go-to for virtually any alpine undertaking. Taking it higher, we refined the design and sourced more sustainable materials while maintaining its exceptional warmth-to-weight ratio and packability. Responsibly-sourced 850 fill down  with Coreloft synthetic utilized in areas prone to moisture  provides premium insulation. The outer, recycled 15D Arato nylon with dope-dyed yarns, is light and durable. An insulated StormHood extends the warmth, and the streamlined ergonomic fit layers easily.
Redesigned with a roomier fit in the chest, reverse coil front zipper and TPU pulls for a cleaner profile and improved durability.

Short Description:
Light, warm down hoody shines as an alpine midlayer and versatile standalone. *The Cerium Hoody was previously the Cerium LT Hoody.

Features:
- Moisture-resistant outer face fabric
- Breathable
- Great warmth-to-weight ratio
- Lightweight
- Compressible and packable
- Wind resistant
- Versatile

ID: X000007467

Name: Cerium Jacket

Description:
Proven across a range of alpine missions and backcountry adventures, the Cerium packs small, weighs little, and delivers big warmth. The design  refined for optimal fit and efficiency  utilizes more sustainable materials while delivering the same outstanding warmth-to-weight ratio. Responsibly-sourced 850 fill down  with Coreloft synthetic utilized in areas prone to moisture  provides premium insulation. The recycled 15D Arato nylon outer is light and durable, the bio-derived liner reduces petroleum use, and the streamlined design is articulated for freedom of movement.

Redesigned with a reverse coil front zipper and TPU pulls for a cleaner profile and improved durability.

Short Description:
Light, warm down jacket shines as an alpine midlayer and versatile standalone. *The Cerium Jacket was previously the Cerium LT Jacket.

Features:
- Moisture-resistant outer face fabric
- Breathable
- Great warmth-to-weight ratio
- Lightweight
- Compressible and packable

ID: X000007297

Name: Cerium Lightweight Hoody

Description:
Minimalist down insulation for cool, dry conditions, the Cerium Lightweight Hoody is exceptionally light and compressible. Designed primarily as a mid layer, its lightweight packability makes it an effective standalone during rest breaks, evenings at camp, or on emergency bivvies. The 850 fill power goose downs warmth to weight ratio is outstanding, and the wind resistant Arato 7 nylon shell is ultra lightweight and provides a high level of tear resistance. An insulated hood adds warmth.

Short Description:
Superlight, highly packable down hoody performs as a mid layer or standalone piece. Down Series: Down insulated garments. *The Cerium Lightweight Hoody was previously the Cerium SL Hoody.

ID: X000007402

Name: Cerium Pant

Description:
Icy mornings at the crags, evening in a backcountry hut, sub-zero ski days, late fall backpacking, or just kicking around camp  when cold is part of the mission, bring these pants. Premium 850 fill goose down means theyre light, warm, easily packed, and ready to deliver warmth during static phases or in an emergency. The streamlined profile layers under our regular fit GORE-TEX pants and bibs, zippers at the lower leg make pulling them on easy, and the articulated patterning is made to move.

Short Description:
Light, easily packed 850 fill goose down pant for static phases or emergency use.

Easily stashed in your pack, its instantly available for core warmth as a midlayer in cold, dry conditions or a standalone during rest breaks or at camp. Responsibly-sourced 850 fill down  with Coreloft synthetic utilized in areas prone to moisture  provides premium insulation. A bio-derived liner helps reduce petroleum use, and the recycled 15D Arato nylon outer is light and durable. A stuff sacks included for compact transport.

ID: X000006699

Name: Coelle Parka

Description:
Wild mountain country  inspired by these landscapes and their weather, the Coelle Parka is made using conscious material choices and designed to keep you warm and protected. Recycled Coreloft synthetic insulation provides thermal performance without bulk, and PFC-free GORE-TEX ePE delivers durably waterproof, windproof, breathable performance. An adjustable StormHood elevates the weather protection, cuff gaskets seal out drafts, and the parka length has you covered.
Size and Fit Tips: Regular Fit - Our classic fit is cut comfortably throughout the chest, waist, hip, and thigh. It allows freedom of movement, provides shape, and layers comfortably over our insulation and midlayers.  Be sure to double-check our new sizing charts before checkout.

Short Description:
GORE-TEX parka providing weather protection and the warmth of Coreloft.

Temperatures drop, but your desire to be outside doesnt. Built for colder conditions and designed for high-output activities, this versatile hoody is a first layer delivering essential thermal performance, moisture management, and soft comfort. Constructed from wicking fibres, its Phasic AR II material  an engineered polyester  provides stretch, sun protection, and is stitched for a smooth finish next to the skin. The fitted hood can be worn under or over a helmet, and the articulated fit frees you to move at speed.

Short Description:
Performance first-layer hoody for high output in cool weather. *The Cormac Heavyweight Hoody was previously the Motus AR Hoody.

Variable weather is a city reality. A core piece for mixed conditions in spring and summer, the superlight Cosine offers measured warmth, resists wind, and repels water with an aesthetic that aligns with the modern urban dress code. The ripstop face fabric is treated to repel moisture, and the 25gsm Coreloft adds breathable insulation for milder conditions. Stretch underarm gussets allow airflow, and low-profile pockets secure and organize your days essentials without disrupting the clean design.

This is essential protection for summer backcountry adventures. A wide brim hat that protects your face, ears, and neck from the sun's rays, the Cranbrook is ventilated for airflow and packs easily into your pockets for compact storage. The durable stretch twill is light and comfortable, and the knit mesh is made with wicking fibres. An antimicrobial finish keeps odours at bay, an adjustable cinch with a TPU buckle keeps it on your head.

Short Description:
Easily packed wide-brim sun hat for warm-weather adventures.

- Lightweight
- Packable

ID: X000006267

Name: Delta Jacket

Description:
Inspired by climbers, then refined to perform across a broad range of alpine activities, the Delta is a go-to when thermal efficiency, stretch, and all-mountain versatility are required. The Polartec Power Dry fleeces voided grid construction delivers a high warmth to weight ratio and provides outstanding freedom of movement. Performing as a midlayer in cold conditions or a standalone in cooler temperatures, its versatility and comfort make it an essential piece of any mountain kit.
Size and Fit Tips: Fitted Fit - This trimmer fit is patterned to stay close to the body through the chest, waist, hip, and thigh. Its low profile eliminates bulk, moves with the body, and fits comfortably under outer layers. This model's fit has evolved. Before you check out, please make sure to reference our sizing chart to determine your correct size.

ID: X000006638

Name: Fission SV Glove

Description:
The Fission SV Glove is the warmest offering from Arc'teryx. It combines the proven performance of Fortius 1.0 with a waterproof and breathable GORE-TEX insert for full weather protection. PrimaLoft Silver and Gold Insulation gives maximum warmth and an additional Octa Loft breathable insulation lining next to skin manages moisture and makes for an easy on/off. Too add to the ruggedness, a double layer of premium goat leather reinforcements enhance durability. An elasticated wrist strap provides a precision fit and the pull to open/pull to close gauntlet ensures severe weather is sealed out.

Short Description:
Insulated and GORE-TEX weatherproof, Arc'teryx's warmest glove with the durability and versatility for skiing, snowboarding and winter sports. | SV: Severe Weather.

ID: X000005981

Name: Gamma AR Pant

Description:
Moving across rock, ice, or trail is dynamic. As conditions shift, protection from weather is an imperative. The trim-fitting Gamma AR Pant is refined for climbing, but delivers the versatility needed for hikes and approaches on mixed terrain. Wind and water resistant, its DWR treated double-weave fabric combines performance stretch, abrasion resistance and excellent breathability. A gusseted crotch and articulated knees along with the fabrics stretch deliver exceptional freedom of movement.

Short Description:
Versatile wind and water resistant softshell pant with performance stretch. Gamma Series: Softshell outerwear with stretch | AR: All Round.

ID: X000006823

Name: Gamma Guide Pant

Description:
With a hybrid design balancing durability, stretch, and water repellency, the Gamma Guide Pant meets the exacting demands of guides and mountain professionals. The thighs and seat use Burly double weave for abrasion resistance and weather protection. Wee Burly material is used on the back and lower half of the legs to shed weight and improve breathability. Harness-accessible thigh pockets hold notepads and digital tools, the lower leg unzips to fit over boots, and the clean fit is articulated for freedom of movement.

Short Description:

{"id_":"./data/product_textfiles/Gamma_Hybrid_Pullover.txt","metadata":{},"excludedEmbedMetadataKeys":[],"excludedLlmMetadataKeys":[],"relationships":{},"hash":"t10rvsahud0xjwV0xNNj8zZtAWRKUNUGreFVmJgS/Zs=","text":"Product URL: womens/gamma-hybrid-pullover

ID: X000006516

Name: Gamma Hybrid Pullover

Description:
This Gamma is built to meet climbings distinct demands: freedom of movement, durability, and light weather protection. The hybrid construction utilizes two materials. Aequora AirPerm at the body is durable and air permeable, and Fortius Air 50 underarm side panels add ventilation. Outstanding stretch combines with articulated patterning for unrestricted movement, a helmet-compatible StormHood protects the head, and its packable  stuff it into its chest pocket and clip it to your harness.

Short Description:

{"id_":"./data/product_textfiles/Heliad_6_Crossbody_Bag.txt","metadata":{},"excludedEmbedMetadataKeys":[],"excludedLlmMetadataKeys":[],"relationships":{},"hash":"6kYE0jh9veL1hBr6dg+0n6r07dQK0FyGFwNOHBGUMCI=","text":"Product URL: heliad-6-crossbody-bag

ID: X000007973

Name: Heliad 6 Crossbody Bag

Description:
You travel light. Just the essentials. Streamlined and light, packable and efficient, the Heliad is sized right for lunch and a light windshell, some books and a tablet, or the things you want to carry on the flight and easily stash under the seat in front of you. You can wear it how you want - as a sling bag or waist pack - and the rectangular design maximizes usable space, is easy to pack, and gives it a clean, contemporary look.

Redesigned with a longer adjustable strap for freedom of movement.

Description:
With a progressive aesthetic highlighted by clean lines and the distinctive hood, our warmest weatherproof jacket is an essential for frigid, stormy city environments. GORE-TEX sheds rain, snow, and wind. Lofty 850 fill down insulates. Its built for maximum warmth and protection. Box-wall baffle construction maximizes the downs loft and eliminates cold spots. The hood  warm, protective, and ponytail compatible  incorporates a soft insulated draft collar that encircles the face. Multiple pockets provide secure and accessible storage. The lines are clean, and articulated patterning frees you to move.

Name: Kadin Hoody

Description:
Weather, terrain, temperature - natures unpredictability is essential to the experience, so stay comfortable and enjoy the adventure. The Kadins GORE-TEX INFINIUM softshell fabric blocks wind, sheds light rain, and breathes. The trim fits articulated patterning moves with you, underarm vents prevent overheating, and the streamlined hood adds protection and adjusts with a single pull. When conditions clear, stuff it into its pocket and clip it to your pack until you need it again.

Name: Kadin Jacket

Description:
Warm, damp, humid  these conditions require exceptional weather resistance and a high level of breathability. Versatile, light, and packable, the Kadins made with GORE-TEX INFINIUM, a highly water-resistant softshell fabric, for protection and comfort in warm climates. Underarm vents increase airflow, the woven liner regulates internal comfort, and taped seams seal out moisture. The trim fits articulated for mobility, and for easy transport, the jacket stuffs into its own pocket and clips to your pack.
Crafted at a Fair Trade Certified facility as part of our commitment to transition 80% of Arcteryx products to fair trade certification by 2025.

ID: X000004998

Name: Konseal 15 Backpack

Description:
Streamlined, agile, minimalist, and incredibly durable - the 310 gram Konseal 15 is hardwired for climbing. Its sized to carry essential multi-pitch gear, opens to keep contents from dumping while on belays, has a low profile for easy access gear loops and chalk bag, and is made from our breakthrough Hadron pack fabric. Leveraging an engineered LCP (liquid crystal polymer) grid, Hadron delivers outstanding abrasion resistance for exceptionally little weight. Its a new standard in lightweight alpine durability - a perfect choice for granites rugged realities.

Short Description:
Compact, light, incredibly durable 15L pack for multi-pitch climbing essentials.

The 40-litre Konseal - perfectly sized for a day at the crags - is created for a comfortable carry and clean workflow. The materials - a 690D Cordura with our Hadron LCP (liquid crystal polymer) grid on the lid - are highly abrasion resistant. Carry comfort comes from its supportive frame and ergonomically padded hipbelt and shoulder straps. Access is easy with the stand-up design, wide top opening, no-spill lid, and high-visibility interior. And its optimized to carry our Ion Rope Bag.

{"id_":"./data/product_textfiles/Kyanite_Crew_Neck_Pullover.txt","metadata":{},"excludedEmbedMetadataKeys":[],"excludedLlmMetadataKeys":[],"relationships":{},"hash":"POpPv+xIIRB1ezWOY07O5Dxvy3yQjI0QI3Vlb3ngS8o=","text":"Product URL: mens/kyanite-crew-neck-pullover

ID: X000007150

Name: Kyanite Crew Neck Pullover

Description:
A simple solution that works as a midlayer and standalone, the Kyanite Crew cuts the chill on ski days, quick climbs, or fall hikes. Delivering warmth, mobility, and comfort, the Polartec Power Stretch Pro fleece allows airflow for breathability, has a durable nylon face for abrasion resistance, and a brushed interior thats really soft. The fabrics four-way stretch combines with articulated patterning for exceptional freedom of movement, and the clean fit layers easily under a shell.

ID: X000006939

Name: Kyanite Hoody

Description:
Ski tours, fall mornings at camp, chilly days at the crags - the warmest Kyanites thermal performance, durability and soft comfort lets it shine as a midlayer or standalone. Polartec Power Stretch Pro has a nylon face for abrasion resistance, and its four-way stretch combines with articulated patterning for exceptional freedom of movement. The unrestricted fit layers easily under a shell, a low-profile ScubaHood adds warmth, and the brushed fleece interior wicks moisture and is really soft.
Size and Fit Tips: Fitted Fit - This trimmer fit is patterned to stay close to the body through the chest, waist, hip, and thigh. Its low profile eliminates bulk, moves with the body, and fits comfortably under outer layers. This model's fit has evolved. ID: X000006667

Name: Merino Wool Ski Sock

Description:
Freeride, backcountry touring, racking up laps at the resort  this is our performance sock for skiers. The targeted cushioning and performance fit align with your boots for maximum comfort. Shins, toes, and heels are padded, and a grid texture at the shin adds channeled breathability. Its designed to minimize slip that can cause friction, and arch support is built in. And its made with Merino wool, a material known for odour resistance, thermal regulation, and soft comfort.

Short Description:
Versatile Merino-blend snow sports sock delivering comfort and technical performance.

Features:
- Breathable
- Versatile
- Light cushioning
- Natural merino wool has antiodour properties
- Warm and comfortable

{"id_":"./data/product_textfiles/Micon_16_Backpack.txt","metadata":{},"excludedEmbedMetadataKeys":[],"excludedLlmMetadataKeys":[],"relationships":{},"hash":"/bJgtb9Yx6ZCN0S4yS5S8KDyfdVzFwgrtlZ+Taa2aJI=","text":"Product URL: micon-16-backpack

ID: X000007510

Name: Micon 16 Backpack

Description:
Lightweight, streamlined, exceptionally durable  this highly weather-resistant 16L pack is designed for minimalist backcountry missions. Great in bounds and out, it provides a balanced, comfortable carry and easy access to critical tools for short tours and power-assisted skiing. The high tenacity N210r HT nylon pack cloth is tough and light, ultra durable N400r-AC nylon 6 ripstop waterproof fabric used in areas exposed to snow and moisture, and critical seams are taped for added water resistance. The panel-loading main compartment opens wide for quick access to gear and the dedicated avalanche tool pocket. A lid pocket stashes gloves and other small essentials. Snowboards carry vertically, skis A-frame or diagonally.

Short Description:
Streamlined, durable, weather-resistant 16L pack for minimalist backcountry tours. *The Micon 16 Backpack was previously the Rush SK 16 Backpack.

- Lightweight
- Durable

ID: X000007518

Name: Micon 32 Backpack

Description:
Peaceful uptracks, incredible descents, the views - this is why you choose the backcountry. Comfortable and durable, and the Micon 32 is optimized for tours with a balanced carry, weather protection, and intuitive organization. A dedicated pocket keeps avalanche tools right at hand, the roll-top main compartment stores your days kit, helmet carries externally, and a lid pocket stashes goggles and small essentials. Built for alpine conditions, its high tenacity N210r HT nylon and N400r-AC ripstop combine for focused durability and weather protection, critical seams are taped, and zippers are WaterTight. 

Short Description:
Durable, weather-resistant pack optimized and organized for backcountry tours. *The Micon 32 Backpack was previously the Rush SK 32 Backpack. *Keep checking back  new colours drop throughout the season.

Description:
Refined simplicity maximizes versatility. Lightly insulated jacket, quick to dry, provides warmth as a midlayer or standalone. Coreloft fibrefill delivers warmth. TerraTex woven softshell delivers wind and weather resistance. Both materials breathe, both stretch. Hidden hand pockets provide function without interrupting the clean lines, internal pocket secures smartphone or passport. Low profile collar adds definition, layers easily.

{"id_":"./data/product_textfiles/Motus_Crew_Neck_Shirt_LS.txt","metadata":{},"excludedEmbedMetadataKeys":[],"excludedLlmMetadataKeys":[],"relationships":{},"hash":"p3BpxA/dnY62+mSPGqsHB6OBs820Fi7jI5P2v0021sw=","text":"Product URL: womens/motus-crew-neck-shirt-ls

ID: X000007501

Name: Motus Crew Neck Shirt LS

Description:
Run snowy trails, power up skin tracks, take long hikes. Step out into wild winter. The Motus Crew Neck LS is a simple piece delivering superior moisture transport and thermal regulation during active pursuits in the coolest conditions. Worn as a first layer, its Phasic AR II is comfortable next to your skin, and quickly wicks away moisture while adding lightweight warmth. It fits close to your body to help maximize fabric performance, but is patterned for comfort and freedom on the move.Crafted at a Fair Trade Certified facility as part of our commitment to transition 80% of Arcteryx products to fair trade certification by 2025.
Size and Fit Tips: Fitted Fit - This trimmer fit is patterned to stay close to the body through the chest, waist, hip, and thigh. Its low profile eliminates bulk, moves with the body, and fits comfortably under our insulation and midlayers. This model's fit has evolved. Before you check out, please make sure to reference our sizing chart to determine your correct size.

Short Description:
Performance first-layer for mountain runs and fast-paced pursuits in cooler weather.

- Moisture-wicking
- Lightweight

With an athletic design focusing on fit and fabric performance, the Motus is an advanced performance top for trail running. Soft and lightweight, the Phasic FL bi-component fabric delivers exceptional moisture management. The anatomical patterning, trim fit and fabrics stretch help the Motus move with the body and keep the fibres close to the skin to maximize wicking performance. {"id_":"./data/product_textfiles/Motus_Hoody.txt","metadata":{},"excludedEmbedMetadataKeys":[],"excludedLlmMetadataKeys":[],"relationships":{},"hash":"Xzw7lNW3ev1xvwc4OtIH7AvHSSv32ajDeOJf3BDu39o=","text":"Product URL: womens/motus-hoody

ID: X000007508

Name: Motus Hoody

Description:
Seasons change, but your desire to run stays constant. Built for colder conditions and designed for mountain runs and other high output activities, the versatile Motus Hoody is a first layer that provides essential thermal performance, moisture management and soft comfort. Its Phasic AR II material pulls moisture off the body, provides stretch freedom, and is merrow stitched for a smooth finish next to the skin. The fitted hood adds warmth and the articulated fit frees you move at speed.Crafted at a Fair Trade Certified facility as part of our commitment to transition 80% of Arcteryx products to fair trade certification by 2025.
Size and Fit Tips: Fitted Fit - This trimmer fit is patterned to stay close to the body through the chest, waist, hip, and thigh. Its low profile eliminates bulk, moves with the body, and fits comfortably under our insulation and midlayers. This model's fit has evolved. Before you check out, please make sure to reference our sizing chart to determine your correct size.

Short Description:
Performance hoody worn as a first layer for high output in cool weather.

Features:
- Moisture-wicking
- Highly breathablemaintains comfort during aerobic activity
- Lightweight
- Quick-drying

Gender Category:
Women's

ID: X000007517

Name: Norvan 14 Vest

Description:
Mountain running and technical hikes  the Norvan 14 carries the hydration, clothing, calories, and the alpine tools you need to push beyond the trail and extend the adventure. Its breathable stretch mesh material and multiple adjustment points create a secure, bounce-free fit. Multiple PowerNet stretch mesh front pockets secure small essentials, and the nylon main compartment carries clothing and larger gear. Two 500mL hydration flasks are included, and an embedded RECCO reflector can aid search in rescue situations.

Designed with multiple adjustments for a precise fit, it holds a light shell, calories, water, plus a helmet and technical mountain tools. Dump pockets at the top and back are sized for larger gear.

Our lightest, most compact hat, it wears under a helmet or hood.

ID: X000006371

Name: Norvan Crew Neck Shirt SS

Description:
Youre a trail runner. Your kit is carefully chosen to help you move at speed on long runs across rugged terrain. The Norvan Crew Neck leverages a hybrid construction to maximize moisture management, airflow, and comfort. Made with wicking fibres, its Phasic FL fabric is soft next-to-skin, while an ultralight mesh on the back improves airflow. Merrow seams and laminated finishes in key areas minimize chafe, the design rides comfortably under a hydration vest, and articulated patterning removes restriction.
Crafted at a Fair Trade Certified facility as part of our commitment to transition 80% of Arcteryx products to fair trade certification by 2025.

Short Description:
Pinnacle performance in a breathable, comfortable trail running shirt.

ID: X000007386

Name: Norvan Hybrid Tight

Description:
Thermoregulation, stretch, weather protection  the Norvan Hybrid Tight keeps you running all year. The hybrid design starts with a durable, breathable nylon with a warm brushed backer and outstanding stretch, then places highly breathable four-way stretch GORE-TEX INFINIUM at the thighs to block wind and repel water and snow. The articulated patterning and ergonomic features are fine-tuned for mountain running, and the design layers easily with our Norvan shorts.

The Norvan Hybrid Tight offers the same performance as the past season's Norvan Hybrid Pant in a more efficient fit.

Description:
All seasons, any distance  the Norvan LD 3 GTX is made to run all year. High-abrasion mesh upper has GORE-TEX protection for breathable comfort in the wettest conditions. {"id_":"./data/product_textfiles/Norvan_Nivalis_GTX_Shoe.txt","metadata":{},"excludedEmbedMetadataKeys":[],"excludedLlmMetadataKeys":[],"relationships":{},"hash":"oBRaRkkaj1TdGwJe2+BAFgECLXb9KQ/mJ/BKXk2nv4k=","text":"Product URL: norvan-nivalis-gtx-shoe

ID: X000007618

Name: Norvan Nivalis GTX Shoe

Description:
This is the Norvan alpine running shoe for long-distance runs in wet, cold, wintery conditions. Designed for weather protection and confident grip  without sacrificing ride, response, and cushioning  its made with a durable, flexible upper lined with a GORE-TEX bootie for waterproof, breathable protection. A highly breathable water-repellent stretch gaiter with a front zip closure extends to the ankle for added protection from snow, water, and mud entry. The internal construction minimizes friction, the toe box is sized to accommodate splay, and the heel and forefoot stack absorbs shock. Advanced materials include a Vibram LITEBASE sole and InFuse midsole to shed grams, and a grippy Vibram Megagrip rubber compound with an aggressive 6mm lug pattern for a confident bite on winter trails. 

Short Description:
GORE-TEX alpine running shoe designed for long distance runs in wet, wintery conditions.

Features:
- Waterproof
- Breathable
- Lightweight
- Durable
- Abrasion resistant

Light, breathable, and built for speed, the three-inch Norvan is made for trail runners who fly down technical trails. Made from 100% recycled Diem polyester, theyre soft, comfortable and have the freedom of stretch. The minimal inseam, ergonomic patterning, and a split hem eliminate restriction, and a built-in brief wicks moisture. The breathable waistband is designed for comfort and security on extended runs, and a zippered back pocket provides bounce-free carry for gels.

Name: Norvan Windshell Jacket

Description:
Superlight trail running - it can be like flying. When your kit is weightless, youre free to glide. Diligently refined to deliver maximum performance for the least possible weight, the Norvan protects you on exposed trails and prepares you for shifting conditions. Canim ripstop resists wind and moisture, Permair 20 panels ventilate, shaped cuffs, a mid-height collar extends protection and - at just 65 grams and packed into its own pocket - it travels virtually unnoticed. Until you need it.

Short Description:
Superlight, packable, ultra-minimalist trail running windshell.

- Compressible and packable
- Wind resistant

Name: Nuclei Pant

Description:
Light, packable, and built for belays, or anyplace exposed to biting cold, the Nuclei provides warmth that frees you to focus on your task. 80g Coreloft Continuous insulation goes from waist to knee, with 60g at the lower leg to balance appropriate warmth and light weight. The light, tough Arato 15 fabric blocks wind, and GORE-TEX reinforces the seat and knees. Full separating side zips make on-and-off easy - even on hanging belays - and an accessible thigh pocket doubles as a stuff sack.

ID: X000007494

Name: Nuclei SV Parka

Description:
Serious cold requires serious warmth. Packable, light, and efficient, the Nuclei SV is our warmest synthetically insulated belay parka. Varying layers of Coreloft insulation are strategically placed to provide maximum warmth while keeping weight down, and the light, tough Arato 15 shell is breathable, windproof, and repels light moisture. Three external and two internal pockets keep essentials at hand, and the helmet compatible StormHood protects without impeding vision.
Size and Fit Tips: Regular Fit - Our classic fit is cut comfortably throughout the chest, waist, hip, and thigh. It allows freedom of movement, provides shape, and layers comfortably over our first layers. This model's fit has evolved. Be sure to double-check our new sizing charts before checkout.

A high-performance, non-residue detergent that gently and thoroughly cleans and restores loft and insulation performance in down and synthetic-insulated apparel. Down Wash delivers excellent results at low temperatures. The concentrated formulation is biodegradable and does not contain conditioners, bleachers, microplastics or optical brighteners. The bottle is made from 100% recycled plastic.

ID: X000006499

Name: Patera Long Parka

Description:
When winter brings its worst  those are the days for the longest Patera. Its GORE-TEX protection and down insulation work together for warmth and waterproof, snowproof, windproof storm protection. The fit is comfortable and has shape and structure, and the mid-calf length extends coverage and creates a clean, distinctive silhouette. Gaskets at the cuff and neck keep drafts out, Coreloft synthetic insulation is used in areas prone to moisture, and the insulated hood adds another level of warmth.
Size and Fit Tips: The Patera Long Parka is roomier than the Patera Parka to allow for extra layers in extreme cold.Regular Fit - Our classic fit is cut comfortably throughout the chest, waist, hip, and thigh. It allows freedom of movement, provides shape, and layers comfortably over our insulation and midlayers.  Be sure to double-check our new sizing charts before checkout.

ID: X000006443

Name: Patera Parka

Description:
The places where winter throws everything at you  snow and sleet, wind and rain, bitter cold  these are the places for the Patera. Its goose down fill wraps you in warmth, and the soft, breathable GORE-TEX fabric shields you from the weather. Coreloft synthetic insulation is used in areas prone to moisture  including the adjustable hood  and gaskets at the neck and cuffs seal out drafts. The length adds coverage and distinctive Patera style, and the clean, structured fit allows room for layering.
Size and Fit Tips: The revised Patera Parka has a slightly roomier fit to accommodate layers while maintaining its clean silhouette.Fitted Fit - This trimmer fit is patterned to stay close to the body through the chest, waist, hip, and thigh. Its low profile eliminates bulk, moves with the body, and fits comfortably over our insulation and midlayers. This model's fit has evolved. Before you check out, please make sure to reference our sizing chart to determine your correct size.

Distinctive winter parka combining downs warmth with GORE-TEX weather protection.

ID: X000006092

Name: Patrol Vest

Description:
Designed to maximize utility and access for patrol and rescue pros. Built with a durable, high-tenacity 210D nylon and back spacer mesh to allow airflow, the Patrol Vest fits a wide range of body types with shoulder and side-panel adjustors, layering easily over winter layering systems. The integrated hip belt carries the load close to the body. The back compartment is large enough for avalanche tools, with a separate pass-through pocket to easily access other large items. The front pocket configuration is maximized to offer easy access to essential tools, including standard issue radios.

Short Description:
Adjustable utility vest with integrated hip belt for even load distribution and wearing comfort.

./data/product_textfiles/Proton_Hoody.tx.__data__:
{"id_":"./data/product_textfiles/Proton_Hoody.txt","metadata":{},"excludedEmbedMetadataKeys":[],"excludedLlmMetadataKeys":[],"relationships":{},"hash":"pyBGqOVoCgCNIcEMRUBW77locL4yyzBdcAPKNjKqb1Q=","text":"Product URL: womens/proton-hoody

ID: X000006560

Name: Proton Hoody

Description:
The Proton Hoody is equipped with a breathable insulation package to manage the dynamic needs of mountain pursuits and perform as a self-regulating mid layer for a variety of high output activities. Breathable insulation means excess heat and moisture can pass through the combination of air permeable fabrics and insulation. In addition to being extremely air permeable, the Fortius Air 20 face fabric has unrivaled hardwearing durability, over 60 times more durable in abrasion tests than the industry standard. Coreloft Compact 80 synthetic insulation in the body maintains excellent stretch recovery. The No Slip Zip keeps the main zipper from self-opening and the helmet compatible insulated hood gives additional warmth. Put it on, leave it on and stay focused on the activity.

Size and Fit Tips: Fitted Fit - This trimmer fit is patterned to stay close to the body through the chest, waist, hip, and thigh. Its low profile eliminates bulk, moves with the body, and fits comfortably over our first layers. This model's fit has evolved. Before you check out, please make sure to reference our sizing chart to determine your correct size.

Short Description:
Extremely durable and breathable, synthetically insulated lightweight hoody for high output activities. 

Features:
- Wind resistant
- Abrasion resistant
- Air permeable
- Water resistant

GORE-TEX INFINIUM at the yoke and hood delivers zonal windproof protection and helps shed light snow and sleet. Versatile, comfortable  this is a go-to backcountry piece.

Insulation balancing warmth, airflow, and protection on backcountry tours.

ID: X000004926

Name: Rescue Pack 50

Description:
This pack was specifically designed with rescue technicians in mind.  With a superior, adjustable load carrying suspension, highly durable N315r-LCP fabric and multiple access points, this pack can carry and organize all essential rescue equipment.  Featuring a unique large front pocket with double side zips, custom webbing daisy chains and Velcro that enables users to fully open the front pocket and customize their work surface. The extra large side access zipper and external attachment points provide additional versatility.

Short Description:

ID: X000006518

Name: Rethel Hoody

Description:
Worn as a midlayer or standalone, the Rethel takes on adventure wherever you find it. Made from 73% recycled polyester, its Polartec Power Air fabric is soft, thermally efficient, pill resistant, and engineered to minimize shedding and help keep microplastics out of our oceans. A DWR (Durable Water Repellent) treatment repels moisture, and the hood pulls on quickly for added warmth. The fit layers easily, and articulated patterning elevates freedom of movement on the trail.

Short Description:
Versatile, thermally efficient fleece hoody for hikes and mountain adventure.

- Air permeable
- Warm and comfortable

Name: Rho Crew Neck LS

Torrent lightweight fleece stretches, wicks away moisture, and has brushed interior that elevates performance and soft comfort. A Polygiene treatment provides long lasting odour control. Merino wool offers exceptional technical performance - naturally. The Rho Merino Wool Bottom, made from Responsible Wool Standard (RWS) certified Merino, regulates thermal comfort, resists odours and static, and is soft and comfortable. ID: X000007248

Name: Rho Merino Wool Crew Neck LS

Description:
Ski tours, extended backpacking trips, climbing - this is an exceptionally versatile base layer youll go to for anything outdoors. Made from Responsible Wool Standard (RWS) certified Merino, it naturally regulates thermal comfort, resists odours and static, and feels comfortable next to your skin. The fit keeps the wool close to your body for maximum effectiveness, elastane fibres add stretch and hold the fit, and articulated patterning gives you freedom to move.
Crafted at a Fair Trade Certified facility as part of our commitment to transition 80% of Arcteryx products to fair trade certification by 2025.
Size and Fit Tips: Fitted Fit - This trimmer fit is patterned to stay close to the body through the chest, waist, hip, and thigh. Its low profile eliminates bulk, moves with the body, and fits comfortably under our insulation and midlayers. This model's fit has evolved. Before you check out, please make sure to reference our sizing chart to determine your correct size.

ID: X000006720

Name: Rivet Glove

Description:
The versatile Rivet Glove performs as a standalone on cold dry days and layers easily under a shell in more demanding conditions.  Made with durable air permeable Polartec Power Stretch fleece with Hardface Technology, the smooth outer face resists wind, sheds snow and easily slides in and out of shell layers. The soft fleece inside is warm and comfortable, a DWR finish provides additional weather protection, and the supple leather reinforcement at the palm adds durability and improves grip. The Trim fit with low profile cuffs reduces layering bulk, and conductive polyurethane pads on the thumb and index finger improve grip and allow the use of touch screen electronics while wearing the gloves.

Short Description:
Versatile, weather resistant Polartec Power Stretch fleece with Hardface Technology glove performs on its own or as an insulation layer under a shell.

- Lightweight
- Durable

{"id_":"./data/product_textfiles/Rush_Insulated_Jacket.txt","metadata":{},"excludedEmbedMetadataKeys":[],"excludedLlmMetadataKeys":[],"relationships":{},"hash":"CnGhUnIrBtXvrUtPvIxGSq6uyf1BIUT+vaxUoCTrrOc=","text":"Product URL: womens/rush-insulated-jacket

ID: X000005948

Name: Rush Insulated Jacket

Description:
Rest phases, transitions, descents  the backcountry cold hits once you step off the skin track. Light, packable, and warm, the Rush is ready when output stops and temperatures drop. Windproof, water repellant, and highly breathable, the GORE-TEX INFINIUM outer utilizes our Hadron face fabric for maximum durability, minimal weight. 100gsm Coreloft insulates, an air-permeable liner speeds vapour transfer, the helmet-compatible StormHood adds warmth, and an embedded RECCO reflector aids search and rescue.Crafted at a Fair Trade Certified facility as part of our commitment to transition 80% of Arcteryx products to fair trade certification by 2025.
Size and Fit Tips: Regular Fit - Our classic fit is cut comfortably throughout the chest, waist, hip, and thigh. It allows freedom of movement, provides shape, and layers comfortably over our insulation and midlayers.  Be sure to double-check our new sizing charts before checkout.

Short Description:
Light, durable insulated jacket for windproof warmth on backcountry tours.

Features:
- Windproof
- Insulated
- Water repellent
- Highly breathable

ID: X000007454

Name: Sabre Glove

Description:
An insulated GORE-TEX glove for big mountain freeriding, the Sabre delivers warmth and protection with grip and dexterity. Designed with a low-profile bonded cuff for easy layering, its weather protection comes from a breathable, anatomically-shaped GORE-TEX insert that seals out wet, wind, and snow. A Fortius 1.0 softshell outer provides abrasion resistance and stretch performance, leather palm reinforcements up durability, and two types of PrimaLoft insulation provide warmth.

Redesigned with a lower-profile bonded cuff for easier layering under a jacket.  

Short Description:
Durable, comfortable insulated GORE-TEX glove for freeride skiing and snowboarding.

- Durable
- Warm and comfortable

Description:
Blending mitten warmth and glove dexterity, the split-finger Sabre is a go-to for freeriding in cold conditions. The Fortius 1.0 exterior provides durability and stretch performance, while the anatomically-shaped  GORE-TEX insert seals out snow, wind, and rain. Breathable Octa Loft and two types of PrimaLoft synthetic insulation are balance warmth, climate control, and ergonomic freedom. Leather reinforcements add grip and durability, and the low-profile cuff layers easily under a jacket.

ID: X000007183

Name: Sabre Insulated Jacket

Description:
Backcountry or frontside  this is the jacket for cold days on the snow. Recycled Coreloft provides air-permeable insulation, and the breathable GORE-TEX fabric shuts out wet, wind, and snow. An insulated StormHood fits over your helmet for added warmth and weather protection, and the pit zippers have PowderGuard mesh so you can dump heat without letting the snow in. Its patterned for freedom of movement, and a RECCO reflector is embedded to aid search and rescue.  

Short Description:
Warm GORE-TEX jacket for the backcountry and resort.

Name: Saydi Hoody

Description:
Purpose inspires design. Created for late-season hikes across a range of conditions and environments, the Saydi delivers wind protection and light warmth on mountain trails. Made from 3L GORE-TEX INFINIUM, its windproof, water resistant, and highly breathable. A brushed backer adds light warmth. Durable, waterproof, windproof, and breathable, it has a brushed liner to add light insulation and softness. The full bib ups the protection and has a large front pocket to stash gloves or snacks. PowderCuffs keep out snow, thigh vents dump heat, and an embedded RECCO reflector can aid search and rescue. 
Redesigned with a flannel-backed N80p 3L GORE-TEX for improved durability and comfort.

Extremely hardwearing, the Ski Guide Bib is our most durable ski pant designed for mechanized ski guides and ski patrollers working in deep, severe winter conditions. It is built with our extremely durable N140d 3L GORE-TEX PRO Most Rugged to protect against harsh mountain environments and equipment. Equipped with removable foam kneepads, high-volume thigh pockets for tools and notebooks, and a softshell bib, this is an ideal pant for winter professionals who require max coverage for deep days. Extended TPU instep patches protect boot cuffs from cuts and abrasion.

Short Description:

Name: Ski Guide Pant

Description:
The hardwearing Ski Guide Pant is built for professionals working in severe winter conditions. It is built with highly durable but lightweight N100d 3L GORE-TEX PRO Most Rugged to protect against harsh mountain environments and wear from equipment. Equipped with removable foam kneepads, thigh vents, and high-volume thigh pockets for tools and notebooks. TPU instep guards protect boot cuffs from cuts and abrasion. This pant is ideal for ski guides and ski patrollers looking for a balance of weight and durability.

Short Description:

ID: X000007227

Name: Solano Hoody

Description:
Chilling wind and light drizzle  the weather isnt always severe, but its still out there. Stay comfortable with the Solano. A hiking shell made to meet shifting conditions, it leverages highly breathable GORE-TEX INFINIUM fabric for windproof, rain-repellent protection. An adjustable hood extends coverage. Articulated patterning provides unrestricted freedom, and a hybrid liner construction  smooth in the sleeves for easy on-and-off, knit in the body for breathability  ups the comfort.

Redesigned with updated style lines, a more comfortable performance fit, a knit jersey liner in the body for improved softness and breathability, and nylon plain weave sleeve liners for comfort and easier on-and-off.  

Short Description:
Windproof, water-repellent GORE-TEX INFINIUM hoody with versatile design.

ID: X000007411

Name: Squamish Hoody

Description:
Squamish, BC, home to climbers, hikers and skiers, is a unique place where mountains meet the coast. Over time, its namesake hoody has proven itself essential, packable wind protection with active adventure in mild, but shifting weather. Made with Tyono 30 nylon, an advanced, highly wind-resistant fabric that offers surprising strength for its weight, the Squamish Hoody features ultralight minimalist construction, an adjustable Stormhood, No Slip Zip, dual hem adjustments and stows in its chest pocket so you can easily stash it in a pack or clip it to a harness.Updated with a revised fit.

Short Description:
The legendary Arcteryx windshell built for mild, but shifting, conditions.

- Lightweight
- Compressible and packable
- Wind resistant

{"id_":"./data/product_textfiles/Taema_Arc'Word_Crew_Neck_Shirt_SS.txt","metadata":{},"excludedEmbedMetadataKeys":[],"excludedLlmMetadataKeys":[],"relationships":{},"hash":"Av2V0n7M/NC/cDJlB6JtdHFcNdmdVwxPQyzt5E48fXw=","text":"Product URL: womens/taema-arc-word-crew-neck-shirt-ss

ID: X000006820

Name: Taema Arc'Word Crew Neck Shirt SS

Description:
Featuring an Arcteryx graphic, and made to move comfortably on mountain trails, the versatile Taema wicks, breathes, and feels great next to the skin. Made from Phasic LT, a material containing 80% recycled content, it delivers moisture management and UPF 50+ sun protection. Articulated patterning elevates mobility and freedom, FC0 DWR helps minimize moisture absorption, and the seam construction reduces bulk and increases comfort.

Crafted at a Fair Trade Certified facility as part of our commitment to transition 80% of Arcteryx products to fair trade certification by 2025.

Size and Fit Tips: Regular Fit - Our classic fit is cut comfortably throughout the chest, waist, hip, and thigh. It allows freedom of movement, provides shape, and layers comfortably under our insulation and midlayers. This model's fit has evolved. Before you check out, please make sure to reference our sizing chart to determine your correct size.

Short Description:
Light and comfortable performance shirt for high output mountain activities.

- Lightweight
- Quick-drying

Name: Theriss Down Jacket

Description:
Tahoe, Japan, the Rockies, or Whistler  wherever you find your turns, the Theriss keeps you dry and warm and does it with a streamlined mountain aesthetic. Waterproof, windproof, breathable 2L GORE-TEX protects, while lofty responsibly-sourced goose down keeps you warm. Coreloft synthetic insulation is used in areas prone to moisture, and the design forms the insulation around your body for more efficient performance. The insulated hood adds warmth, an embedded RECCO reflector can aid search and rescue, and a removable powder skirt seals out snow.
Size and Fit Tips: Regular Fit - Our classic fit is cut comfortably throughout the chest, waist, hip, and thigh. It allows freedom of movement, provides shape, and layers comfortably over our insulation and midlayers.  Be sure to double-check our new sizing charts before checkout.

Short Description:
Warm, dry GORE-TEX ski and snowboard jacket with down insulation and resort style.

- Waterproof
- Windproof
- Breathable
- Durable

ID: X000006778

Name: Theriss High-Rise Pant

Description:
The freedom of being on the snow  that unique feeling is the inspiration for the Theriss.  Streamlined and seriously stretchy, our trimmest pant for on-area skiing and snowboarding moves with you  every turn, every run. Highly breathable GORE-TEX INFINIUM softshell blocks wind, resists rain and snow, and has four-way mechanical stretch for outstanding mobility and fit. An Embedded RECCO reflector can aid search and rescue. The high rise and wide waistband are comfortable, layer easily under your jacket, and give the Theriss its clean, contemporary look.

Short Description:
Streamlined, stretchy snowsports pant made from GORE-TEX INFINIUM softshell.

- Windproof

- Highly breathable

ID: X000005659

Name: Thorium Hoody

Description:
A proven hoody for cold, dry conditions, the Thorium delivers serious warmth and handles a wide range of environments. Packed with 750 fill-power Responsible Down Standard certified grey goose down, it offers outstanding thermal performance for its weight. Down Composite Mapping strategically places Coreloft synthetic insulation in areas prone to moisture. The light, durable Arato 30 nylon shell has a DWR treatment for water repellency, the liner s bio-derived material reduces petroleum use, and the insulated adjustable hood fits over a helmet.
Size and Fit Tips: The Thorium Hoody has a roomier fit in the body and a longer length than its predecessor, the Thorium AR.Regular Fit - Our classic fit is cut comfortably throughout the chest, waist, hip, and thigh. It allows freedom of movement, provides shape, and layers comfortably under our regular and relaxed fit shells. Be sure to reference our new sizing charts before you check out. 


Short Description:
Warm, versatile, standalone hoody insulated with responsibly-sourced goose down. *The Thorium Hoody was previously the Thorium AR Hoody.

ID: X000005965

Name: Thorium Jacket

Description:
The Thorium is made to be a favorite  your go-to when you need the warmth of down to keep you comfortable on cold days outside. Created for performance, comfort, and durability, its filled with warm, lofty, responsibly-sourced 750 fill-power grey goose down and has a lightweight, highly abrasion-resistant Arato 30 nylon shell. Down Composite Mapping strategically places Coreloft synthetic insulation in areas prone to moisture, a DWR treatment repels water, the liner is bio-derived to reduce petroleum use, and multiple pockets provide storage.

ID: X000007347

Name: Thorium SV Hoody

Description:
Theres cold, and theres severe cold. Thorium SV Hoody  our warmest Thorium hoody   is built for the places winter lows get extreme. Constructed with oversized box-wall baffles to eliminate cold spots and maximize loft, its packed with European grey goose down for efficient, effective warmth. Windproof GORE-TEX INFINIUM overlays on the shoulders and insulated hood cut the chill and repel light precipitation, and Coreloft synthetic insulation warms areas prone to moisture. 

Short Description:
Outstanding warmth and zonal weather protection in a down hoody for severe cold.

- Moisture-resistant outer face fabric

- Warm and comfortable

ID: X000007285

Name: Thorium SV Parka

Description:
Packed with European grey goose down, our warmest Thorium is made for severe winter cold. GORE-TEX INFINIUM on the shoulders and insulated hood blocks wind and repels light precipitation, and Coreloft  synthetic insulation warms areas prone to moisture. Articulated patterning and the two-way front zipper provide freedom of movement, and the fit allows room for extra layers. The length extends coverage, and oversized box-wall baffle construction eliminates cold spots and maximizes the downs loft.

Short Description:
Outstanding warmth and zonal weather protection in a down parka for severe cold.

- Moisture-resistant outer face fabric

ID: X000005993

Name: Thorium Vest

Description:
A warm down vest  its a winter necessity. Born from an alpine-proven design, refined to perform as a versatile standalone, the Thorium is the one you reach for before stepping out into the cold. The 750 fill-power Responsible Down Standard certified grey goose down delivers excellent warmth for its weight. Down Composite Mapping strategically places Coreloft synthetic insulation in areas prone to moisture, the bio-derived liner reduces petroleum use, and the light, durable Arato 30 nylon shell has a DWR treatment for water repellency.
Size and Fit Tips: Regular Fit - Our classic fit is cut comfortably throughout the chest, waist, hip, and thigh. It allows freedom of movement, provides shape, and layers comfortably over our first layers.  Be sure to double-check our new sizing charts before checkout.

Short Description:
Warm, versatile, standalone vest insulated with responsibly-sourced goose down.

Features:
- Moisture-resistant outer face fabric
- Breathable

- Compressible and packable

./data/product_textfiles/Venta_AR_Glove..__data__:
{"id_":"./data/product_textfiles/Venta_AR_Glove.txt","metadata":{},"excludedEmbedMetadataKeys":[],"excludedLlmMetadataKeys":[],"relationships":{},"hash":"5yz/zIw7iPAc1RSBScmkwF+F2vdKskIG6yGD4zWwfTI=","text":"Product URL: venta-ar-glove

ID: X000006750

Name: Venta AR Glove

Description:
Made from breathable Fortius 1.0 softshell fabric and GORE-TEX INFINIUM with hi-loft fleece, the Venta AR Glove delivers warmth and weather protection for cross country skiing, snowshoeing or winter trail runs. The fabrics brushed inner is lofty and warm, and the outer sheds snow and light rain. Dexterity is built into the patterning, and premium goat leather reinforcements on the palm and fingers enhance durability and improve grip, but wont absorb moisture. A low bulk elasticized wrist gives easy on/off and fits well under jackets.The Venta AR Glove was previously the Teneo Glove.

Short Description:
Breathable, all-round (AR) GORE-TEX INFINIUM multisport glove with leather reinforcements for durability. Venta Series: Weather resistant softshell garments | AR: All-round.

Features:
- Breathable
- Lightly insulated

Gender Category:
unisex

Categories:
- Accessories

Subcategories:
- Gloves

ID: X000007491

Name: Venta Glove

Description:
Lightweight warmth and windproof protection  the Venta is a go-to glove for cross-country skiing, winter trail runs, and cold-weather hikes. The GORE-TEX INFINIUM softshell fabric blocks wind, repels rain and snow, and breathes. The fleeced interior adds light warmth, dexterity is built into the patterning, and TPU palm reinforcements enhance durability and improve grip. Sensors let you use your touchscreen devices, and a reinforced tab makes it easy to pull them on.

Redesigned with a more durable reinforced leather tab and breathable Octa Loft insulation. 

Short Description:
Lightweight, windproof, breathable, weather-resistant GORE-TEX INFINIUM gloves.

ID: X000007619

Name: Vertex GTX Shoe

Description:
A pinnacle alpine running shoe built for winter realities, the Vertex GTX delivers GORE-TEX protection, security and confidence underfoot, and the added element of an integrated gaiter extending the GORE-TEX above the ankle to help seal out snow, water, and debris. Confidence and protection come from the mid to forefoot TPU rock plate, the 360o rand, and a welded support zone on the upper. Vibram Megagrip, a 5mm lug pattern, and forefoot climbing zone provide grip and security. 

Short Description:
GORE-TEX alpine running shoe designed for wet, snowy conditions. 

Features:
- Breathable
- Lightweight
- Durable
- Abrasion resistant

ID: X000007109

Name: Vertex Shoe

Description:
With an evolved design fine-tuned for alpine running, the Vertex delivers the confidence and security to push off trail and scramble at speed. The upper  made from 100% recycled PFC-free polyester  is durable and breathable, and an integrated knit collar helps seal out debris. Support and protection come from mid to forefoot TPU rock plate, 360-degree randing, and a welded support zone on the upper. Vibram Megagrip, a deep 4mm lug pattern, and friction zone at the forefoot provide confidence and grip on rock and trail.

Short Description:
Secure, comfortable shoe designed for alpine running and scrambling at speed.
